product_name: Nite Ize BugLit Front Bike Light
long_description: With a nod to the insect world, this Nite Ize BugLit front bike light uses a leggy design to make it easy to affix the bright LED to your bike, helping alert others to your presence when riding. Bright LED is encased in a durable polycarbonate plastic housing; large rubberized button makes it easy to toggle between settings. 4 modes let you tailor your lighting needs between high, low, strobe and signal; high power mode puts out 6 lumens, low power mode puts out 1 lumen. Attaching the BugLit is easy and tool-free, thanks to the flexible, grippy 6 in. "legs" that let you affix the light to your bike's handlebar, basket, frame, rack and more. Also includes a small "S" carabiner clip for other attachment options. Nite Ize BugLit front bike light operates on 2 replaceable 2016 3V lithium batteries and has a run time between 10 and 22 hrs., depending on settings.
short_description: With a nod to the insect world, this Nite Ize BugLit front bike light uses a leggy design to make it easy to affix the bright LED to your bike, helping alert others to your presence when riding.
